Delivery Policy

Our company provides delivery services for products according to the following policy:

  • Delivery is available for all products, subject to availability
  • Delivery charges may apply, depending on the order value and location
  • Delivery time may vary depending on the location and product availability

Please note that we do our best to ensure timely delivery, but cannot be held responsible for delays due to unforeseen circumstances such as weather or transportation issues.
